    • Uses of Transaction in core.facade

      Methods in core.facade that return types with arguments of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Transaction> TransactionFacade.getTransactions()
      This method returns all current user's persistent Transaction's data.

    • Uses of Transaction in core.models

      Subclasses of Transaction in core.models 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreditCardToUserTransaction
      Model of the CreditCardToUserTransaction which represents the transaction from a CreditCard to a NormalUser's balance.
      class  SplitTransaction
      Model of the SplitTransaction which represents the transaction from a NormalUser's balance to a StoreOwner's balance.
      class  StoreOwnerToBankAccount
      Model of the StoreOwnerToBankAccount which represents the transaction from a StoreOwner's balance to a BankAccount.
      class  UserToBankAccount
      Model of the UserToBankAccount which represents the transaction from a User's balance to a BankAccount.
      class  UserToUserTransaction
      Model of the UserToUserTransaction which represents the transaction from a NormalUser's balance to another NormalUser's.
      Methods in core.models with parameters of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Transaction.compareTo(Transaction t1)
      Compares two transactions by their creation date.

    • Uses of Transaction in persist.dao

      Methods in persist.dao that return types with arguments of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Transaction> TransactionDAO.findAllTransactions(int userId)
      This method allows to retrieve all the transactions of a user.

    • Uses of Transaction in persist.dao.mysql

      Methods in persist.dao.mysql that return types with arguments of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Transaction> MySqlTransactionDAO.findAllTransactions(int userId)
      This method makes SQL queries on persistent data to find all transactions of the user having userid.
